ohio House Republicans proposed extensive voting restrictions last week including enhanced photo identification requirements stricter rules on absentee voting and bans on ballot drop boxes PERIOD

The voting rights bill House Bill HB  was introduced by Ohio Rep PERIOD Bill Dean RXenia PERIOD

The bill would limit early voting to the  days before Election Day except the Monday before Election Day PERIOD Previously voters had a 28day early voting period PERIOD

HB  would also ban the Secretary of State from mailing absentee ballot applications to voters PERIOD

Only people with with diagnosed physical disabilities that would prevent voting inperson under the new bills provisions can vote inperson PERIOD

The new bill will only allow Ohioans to register to vote with a drivers license passport or state ID PERIOD Previously Ohioans could vote with military IDs utility bills or bank statements in addition to stateissued photo IDs PERIOD

HB  follows another bill HB  in adding stricter requirements to voting PERIOD

HB  was introduced to the Ohio House of Representatives on May  by Rep PERIOD Tom Brinkman RMount Lookout and Rep PERIOD Sharon Ray RWadsworth PERIOD

It seeks to limit drop boxes for mailin voting to the  days before Election Day remove early voting on the Monday before Election Day and require Ohioans to submit two forms of identification to request a mailin ballot PERIOD

Rep PERIOD Brigid Kelly DHyde Park has been a vocal opponent of both bills and characterized them as a step in the wrong direction. our democracy works best when everyone can vote Kelly said PERIOD If we listen to our communities they want to make voting more accessible. defending HB  as necessary to minimize voter fraud Rep PERIOD Scott Wiggam RWooster expressed concerns with the security of ballot drop boxes PERIOD

Wiggam along with six other Republicans is cosponsoring HB  PERIOD

Wiggam also stated that the current period of early voting was too long citing this as a reason to support HB  PERIOD

Whats the difference between  and  and  How about a year of early voting How many days do you actually have to have in order to go vote Wiggam asked PERIOD
